text: FIR No: 178/2024 Date: 21-08-2024 Police Station: Cyberabad North PS Complainant: S. Priya, Age 28, Resident of Miyapur. Incident Details: On 20-08-2024 around 4:45 AM, three offenders attempted to steal cash from an ATM near Hitec City MMTS. The suspects abandoned the attempt when a patrolling vehicle approached. Witnesses reported seeing a white Maruti Swift car leaving the area at high speed. Vehicle had a partial number plate: TS09 ** 3210. Tools found at the scene include a hammer, cutter, and gloves. CCTV footage matches the pattern of an ATM theft gang operating in Hyderabad for the past six months. Sections Applied: IPC 393, 511, 34
